idx_clients_referred_by.name: idx_clients_referred_by
idx_clients_referred_by.where: (deleted_at IS NULL AND referred_by IS NOT NULL)

idx_email_drafts_scheduled.name: idx_email_drafts_scheduled
idx_email_drafts_scheduled.where: (deleted_at IS NULL AND status = 'READY' AND scheduled_at IS NOT NULL)

idx_leads_contact_email_unique.name: idx_leads_contact_email_unique
idx_leads_contact_email_unique.where: (deleted_at IS NULL AND contact_email IS NOT NULL)

idx_meetings_lead.name: idx_meetings_lead
idx_meetings_lead.where: (deleted_at IS NULL AND lead_id IS NOT NULL)

idx_meetings_client.name: idx_meetings_client
idx_meetings_client.where: (deleted_at IS NULL AND client_id IS NOT NULL)

idx_meetings_calendar_event.name: idx_meetings_calendar_event
idx_meetings_calendar_event.where: (deleted_at IS NULL AND calendar_event_id IS NOT NULL)

idx_meetings_conference.name: idx_meetings_conference
idx_meetings_conference.where: (deleted_at IS NULL AND conference_id IS NOT NULL)

idx_messages_unanalyzed.name: idx_messages_unanalyzed
idx_messages_unanalyzed.where: (deleted_at IS NULL AND analyzed_at IS NULL)

idx_projects_owner.name: idx_projects_owner
idx_projects_owner.where: (deleted_at IS NULL AND owner_id IS NOT NULL)

projects_type_client_check.name: projects_type_client_check
projects_type_client_check.value:
(
        (type = 'CLIENT' AND client_id IS NOT NULL)
        OR (
          type IN ('PERSONAL', 'INTERNAL')
          AND client_id IS NULL
        )
      )

idx_proposals_lead.name: idx_proposals_lead
idx_proposals_lead.where: (deleted_at IS NULL AND lead_id IS NOT NULL)

idx_proposals_client.name: idx_proposals_client
idx_proposals_client.where: (deleted_at IS NULL AND client_id IS NOT NULL)

idx_proposals_doc_id.name: idx_proposals_doc_id
idx_proposals_doc_id.where: (deleted_at IS NULL AND doc_id IS NOT NULL)

idx_proposals_share_token.name: idx_proposals_share_token
idx_proposals_share_token.where: (deleted_at IS NULL AND share_token IS NOT NULL AND share_enabled = true)

idx_proposals_countersign_token.name: idx_proposals_countersign_token
idx_proposals_countersign_token.where: (deleted_at IS NULL AND countersign_token IS NOT NULL)

idx_suggestions_message.name: idx_suggestions_message
idx_suggestions_message.where: (deleted_at IS NULL AND message_id IS NOT NULL)

idx_suggestions_thread.name: idx_suggestions_thread
idx_suggestions_thread.where: (deleted_at IS NULL AND thread_id IS NOT NULL)

idx_suggestions_project.name: idx_suggestions_project
idx_suggestions_project.where: (deleted_at IS NULL AND project_id IS NOT NULL)

idx_suggestions_lead.name: idx_suggestions_lead
idx_suggestions_lead.where: (deleted_at IS NULL AND lead_id IS NOT NULL)

idx_tasks_lead.name: idx_tasks_lead
idx_tasks_lead.where: (deleted_at IS NULL AND lead_id IS NOT NULL)

idx_threads_client.name: idx_threads_client
idx_threads_client.where: (deleted_at IS NULL AND client_id IS NOT NULL)

idx_threads_project.name: idx_threads_project
idx_threads_project.where: (deleted_at IS NULL AND project_id IS NOT NULL)

idx_threads_lead.name: idx_threads_lead
idx_threads_lead.where: (deleted_at IS NULL AND lead_id IS NOT NULL)

idx_threads_external.name: idx_threads_external
idx_threads_external.where: (deleted_at IS NULL AND external_thread_id IS NOT NULL)

public.current_user_with_role.definition: SELECT id, role FROM users u WHERE id = auth.uid() AND deleted_at IS NULL
public.current_user_with_role.name: current_user_with_role
